nodes.bodyText: This is an incomplete test, since the change was to verify name of the step in the confirmation modal. Please search and check usage of getSubElements and use it in the test to verify complete text with bold tags in them.

@AkshayBajajML Run tile uses <strong> and the same gets verified in the e2e test with "contains.text" assertion.. Try using <strong> instead of <b> here with the assertion I shared, to see if it works for e2e tests.
